item.text: This is the record of the genealogy of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.
Abraham was the father of Isaac, Isaac the father of Jacob, Jacob the father of Judah and his brothers,

<st data-num="2455" class="">Judah</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="5329" class="">Perez</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2196" class="">Zerah</st> (<st data-num="1537">by</st> <st data-num="2283" class="">Tamar)</st>, <st data-num="5329" class="">Perez</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="2074" class="">Hezron</st>, <st data-num="2074" class="">Hezron</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="689" class="">Ram</st>,

<st data-num="689">Ram</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="284" class="">Amminadab</st>, <st data-num="284" class="">Amminadab</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="3476" class="">Nahshon</st>, <st data-num="3476" class="">Nahshon</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="4533" class="">Salmon</st>,

<st data-num="4533" class="">Salmon</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="1003" class="">Boaz</st> (<st data-num="1537">by</st> <st data-num="4477" class="">Rahab)</st>, <st data-num="1003" class="">Boaz</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="5601" class="">Obed</st> (<st data-num="1537">by</st> <st data-num="4503" class="">Ruth)</st>, <st data-num="5601" class="">Obed</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="2421" class="">Jesse</st>,

and Jesse the father of David the king.

David was the father of Solomon (by the wife of Uriah),

<st data-num="4672" class="">Solomon</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="4497" class="">Rehoboam</st>, <st data-num="4497" class="">Rehoboam</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="7" class="">Abijah</st>, <st data-num="7" class="">Abijah</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="760">Asa</st>,<n id="1" />

<st data-num="760">Asa</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="2498" class="">Jehoshaphat</st>, <st data-num="2498" class="">Jehoshaphat</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="2496" class="">Joram</st>, <st data-num="2496" class="">Joram</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="3604" class="">Uzziah</st>,

<st data-num="3604" class="">Uzziah</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="2488" class="">Jotham</st>, <st data-num="2488" class="">Jotham</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="881" class="">Ahaz</st>, <st data-num="881" class="">Ahaz</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="1478" class="">Hezekiah</st>,

<st data-num="1478" class="">Hezekiah</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="3128" class="">Manasseh</st>, <st data-num="3128" class="">Manasseh</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="301" class="">Amon</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="301" class="">Amon</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="2502" class="">Josiah</st>,
and Josiah the father of Jeconiah and his brothers, at the time of the deportation to Babylon.
After the deportation to Babylon, Jeconiah became the father of Shealtiel, Shealtiel the father of Zerubbabel,

<st data-num="2216">Zerubbabel</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="10" class="">Abiud</st>, <st data-num="10" class="">Abiud</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="1662" class="">Eliakim</st>, <st data-num="1662" class="">Eliakim</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="107" class="">Azor</st>,

<st data-num="107">Azor</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="4524" class="">Zadok</st>, <st data-num="4524" class="">Zadok</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="885" class="">Achim</st>, <st data-num="885" class="">Achim</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="1664" class="">Eliud</st>,

<st data-num="1664">Eliud</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="1648" class="">Eleazar</st>, <st data-num="1648" class="">Eleazar</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="3157" class="">Matthan</st>, <st data-num="3157" class="">Matthan</st> the <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="2384" class="">Jacob</st>,
and Jacob the father of Joseph, the husband of Mary, by whom Jesus was born, who is called Christ.

So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations, and from David to the deportation to Babylon, fourteen generations, and from the deportation to Babylon to Christ, fourteen generations.
Now the birth of Jesus Christ happened this way. While his mother Mary was engaged to Joseph, but before they came together, she was found to be pregnant through the Holy Spirit.

Because <st data-num="2501" class="">Joseph</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="435" class="">husband</st> to be,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510">was</st> a <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous</st> man, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> because he did <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="1165" class="">disgrace</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, he <st data-num="1014" class="">intended</st> to <st data-num="630" class="">divorce</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2977" class="">privately</st>.

When <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> had <st data-num="1760">contemplated</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, an<n id="1" /> <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5316" class="">appeared</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> in a <st data-num="3677" class="">dream</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2501" class="">Joseph</st>, <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st>, do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st> <st data-num="3880">to take</st> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st> as <st data-num="4771">your</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> child <st data-num="1080" class="">conceived</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.

She will <st data-num="5088">give birth</st> to a <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you will <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> will <st data-num="1492">save</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st>.”

<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">what</st> was <st data-num="3004">spoken</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st> would be <st data-num="4137" class="">fulfilled</st>:
“Look! The virgin will conceive and give birth to a son, and they will name him Emmanuel,” which means “God with us.”

When <st data-num="2501" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">awoke</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="5258" class="">sleep</st> he <st data-num="4160" class="">did</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">what</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4367" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. He <st data-num="3880" class="">took</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st>,
but did not have marital relations with her until she gave birth to a son, whom he named Jesus.
